profile.headline: Who We Are
profile.intro: Valment helps SAP-centric organizations build lasting capabilities in enterprise architecture and process intelligence for governed innovation. We apply a disciplined approach—evidence-based discovery, value-driven innovation portfolios, and lean governance—to make improvements and innovation both impactful and sustainable. Founded by practitioners with deep expertise in SAP transformations, innovation management, data platforms, and enterprise architecture.
profile.mission: Our mission is simple: make business value and innovation outcomes visible, trackable, and sustainable. Whether you're optimizing SAP processes, modernizing your architecture, or governing AI and agent adoption, we apply the same disciplined methodology to ensure execution and results.
profile.approach: We typically engage part-time and advisory, designed to strengthen your internal capability rather than create dependency. Most engagements are 0.5–2 days per week, focused on discovery sprints, value-driven innovation portfolios, and fractional leadership.
profile.experience: Global experience across Europe, Asia, and North America in manufacturing, automotive, technology, and professional services sectors.
